track.strDescriptionEN:
"Beautiful Crazy" is a song by American country music singer Luke Combs. The song, which he wrote with Wyatt Durrette and Robert Williford, is a bonus track to his 2017 debut album This One's for You. The song had gained viral attention prior to its release as a single.

History
Before being released as a single, Combs posted videos to Facebook of him performing the song. It also became a regular performance in his concerts, and in 2018, he re-issued his debut album This One's for You (titled This One's for You Too) with a studio version as a bonus track. It was officially sent to radio with an adds date of December 3, 2018. Taste of Country describes the song as "a slow, personal love song that truly showcases the singer's talents".

Commercial performance
On the Hot Country Songs chart dated May 19, 2018, "Beautiful Crazy" debuted at number 6, Combs's highest debut on that chart. The song had not been released as a single at the time, but achieved this position through downloads and streaming following the release of This One's for You Too. It has sold 276,000 copies in the United States as of January 2019.
